title: Mai Potta Kannala Lyrics Album
stanzas: <div>Mai Potta Kannala Lyrics Album

Mai pota kannaala
katti izhuthu poraale.
ava pogum paadhaiyila
usura kondu poraale.

enakkaaga porandhavalae
nee yaen adi ennavittu pona.
unakkaga naan kaathirundhen
adhu therinjumaa pona.

en kannukulla ne vandhu
eppa nulanja.
unna paartha piragu
adi naanum tholanjen.

un kannu imaiya nee
konjam kasakkayila
en mayakkam konjam
theliyudhadi

nee pogum padhai
engum usuru poguthadi.
naan kaththum polambal
saththam unakku
kaekkuthaadi.

adi maiya potu
enna kavuththuputta.
ena manasa odachi
adi kizhichuputta.

adi vera yaarum illa
unna pola
naan vaazha poren
un nenappaala.

Mai pota kannaala
katti izhuthu poraale.
ava pogum paadhaiyila
usura kondu poraale.

enakkaaga porandhavalae
nee yaen adi ennavittu pona.
unakkaga naan kaathirundhen
adhu therinjumaa pona.

un kannu imaiya nee
konjam kasakkayila
en mayakkam konjam
theliyudhadi

nee pogum padhai
engum usuru poguthadi.
naan kaththum polambal
saththam unakku
kaekkuthaadi.

adi maiya potu
enna kavuththuputta.
ena manasa odachi
adi kizhichuputta.

adi vera yaarum illa
unna pola
naan vaazha poren
un nenappaala.

andru oru kaalaiyila
kanna naanum paakkayila
thanni alli kudichen.
en manasa konjam
thavikka vachcha.
thavikka vachcha
nenjula thaagam
innum theerala.
enna venaamunu solli
pogaatha pulla.
unnidathaile kadhal endrum
varamaatten.
natpendrum vendum
endrum kaetkamatten.

manadhil vandha
valigalum una nenachaa
pogume.
en nenjam vittu pogume.

indru valigal tharum
undhan ninaivil
nenjam valikkudhu
azhugudhu unnathaane
marakkave ninaikkuthu
marakkaama thavikkudhu
mai pota kannaal
enna neeyum vaatturiye
manasa konjam pootturiye
vaartha thaane kaetten penne
padhil pesaama
kollaatha pulla
enna kollaatha pulla

Mai pota kannaala
katti izhuthu poraale.
ava pogum paadhaiyila
usura konduthaane poraale.

en kannukulla ne vandhu
eppa nulanja.
unna paartha piragu
adi naanum tholanjen.

un kannu imaiya nee
konjam kasakkayila
en mayakkam konjam
theliyudhadi

nee pogum padhai
engum usuru poguthadi.
naan kaththum polambal
saththam unakku
kaekkuthaadi.

Mai pota kannaala
katti izhuthu poraale.
ava pogum paadhaiyila
usura kondu poraale.
